channel.title: Farrenscape source
channel.description:
[b]Farrenscape, this is an extremely slow exp server, you can edit that as you see fit. But please, i beg you..don't say you made this all by yourself. This one is simple, no client, simplicity is always the best option. And yes this is an allstar source, but i doubt highly that you can tell.[/b]
Pictures: [b]Simple home, outside of bank is wildy, you pvp there[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/fc5fd58563ea4cfe8a999c459577ae1e[/img]
[b]train, very close to enkrona's[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/cdb6c2ebbb7343fe89c2a4e98820f014[/img]
[b]Skills[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/91c362c6c1fd4641b82ca21360cb892d[/img]
[b]Fun pk[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/76324aa98ebd4df89829b6d8df8fcf2e[/img]
[b]Strguild, again, it is a lot like enkrona's[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/03bc2747e245473faa817986292e19ae[/img]
[b]Grand exchange[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/a17a6619774b4df6b49ddbca7410a026[/img]
[b]Monster attack back, yes i've figured it out[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/c2fbb8ea2ec049e4a323d69f15929a01[/img]
[b]Four overused bosses, but as i said simplicity is good[/b] [img]http://api.photoshop.com/home_bad55eb15eaf4707af18e25a3dc88e01/adobe-px-assets/8609b36b34e04c95a2d6d00107bfceac[/img]
[b]Features not stated above[/b]
Exp is as slow as they come, it is 10...as in 10 * hitdiff but as i say..If you run through a field, you wont be able to smell the roses as you pass. Starter is not generous It does have some fun commands like ::transform To use yell you need to type ::starter, helps stem the nastiness of spammers Most items are integrated into the drop system..dont worry that there are only 4 shops You get slayer exp only when you kill a monster..no chests My compiler should work, it is very simple and easy to understand
[b]Source[/b]: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?t4mqqgy1tly]http://www.mediafire.com/?t4mqqgy1tly[/url]
[b]Credits[/b]: Me-did most of the work Allstar base-Only provided the skeleton, i did the rest My friend loken-helped with some things Enkrona-Gave me tons of ideas Various tuts- helped a lot, thank you society!
[b]Thanks[/b]: Thank you moparscape for viewing, and sorry for the large pictures...Was too lazy to trim them down some

item.title: Farrenscape source
item.dc:creator: @wootfarren wootfarren
item.description:
@wootfarren wrote:

Farrenscape, this is an extremely slow exp server, you can edit that as you see fit. But please, i beg you…don’t say you made this all by yourself. This one is simple, no client, simplicity is always the best option. And yes this is an allstar source, but i doubt highly that you can tell.

Pictures:
Simple home, outside of bank is wildy, you pvp there

train, very close to enkrona’s

Skills

Fun pk

Strguild, again, it is a lot like enkrona’s

Grand exchange

Monster attack back, yes i’ve figured it out

Four overused bosses, but as i said simplicity is good

Features not stated above

Exp is as slow as they come, it is 10…as in 10 * hitdiff
but as i say…If you run through a field, you wont be able to smell the roses as you pass.
Starter is not generous
It does have some fun commands like ::transform
To use yell you need to type ::starter, helps stem the nastiness of spammers
Most items are integrated into the drop system…dont worry that there are only 4 shops
You get slayer exp only when you kill a monster…no chests
My compiler should work, it is very simple and easy to understand

Source: http://www.mediafire.com/?t4mqqgy1tly

Credits:
Me-did most of the work
Allstar base-Only provided the skeleton, i did the rest
My friend loken-helped with some things
Enkrona-Gave me tons of ideas
Various tuts- helped a lot, thank you society!

Thanks: Thank you moparscape for viewing, and sorry for the large pictures…Was too lazy to trim them down some

Read full topic
